article_title: In 2013, big issues came at us from all sides
article_text: The world got a new pope. Gay marriage prevailed. The Arab Spring faded. Guns and terrorism brought more heartache. It all happened in 2013, a year that featured big headlines and big issues.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Obama, Obamacare, Edward Snowden, Iran, Syria, marijuana, Boston, Tea Party, Pope Benedict

article_summary:
It all happened in 2013, a year that featured big headlines and big issues.
Gay marriage prevailed.
The world got a new pope.
Guns and terrorism brought more heartache.
The Arab Spring faded.
